title: Business Analyst Post Merger Integration (SAP, Salesforce) (m/f/d)
description: For our existing client we are currently looking for an experienced Business Analyst for Post Merger Integration. Workload: 80% Location: Nearly 100% remote, 2-4 days on site/month in D2 Required. Language skills: German (business fluent), English (business fluent) Your task: Creation of Business Blue Prints for process optimization project, end to end processes (logistics) On the edge also the integration in Salesforce Integration in other modules Execution of an actual/target analysis Execution...
